state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    User->>+Application: Request Question Per Tag
    Application->>+Server: getQuestionsByTagId(tid)
    Server->>-Tag (Mongo): Tag.findById
    Tag (Mongo)-->>+Server: 
    Server->>+Question (Mongo): Question.find(tid)
    Question (Mongo)-->>-Server: 
    Server-->>+Server: sort()
    Server-->>-Application: questionList
